templates.name: Ambassador program / sponsorship
templates.content:
Thanks for your interest in working with us! I would recommend applying to our influencer program here: https://www.halloweencostumes.com/influencer-program.html

You can just follow one of these links and our team will reach out if it's a good fit!

templates.name: Why is one size more expensive than the other sizes?
templates.content: Prices can fluctuate throughout the year depending on the quantity of the item. This is due to production costs, where less popular sizes may end up more expensive at the production level. Unfortunately, we won't be able to lower the price on that item.

templates.name: Size Chart: All - Clothes
templates.content: You can take a look at our size chart here: https://www.halloweencostumes.com/blog/p-1362-how-to-measure-yourself.aspx

templates.name: How do I find my Cart ID?
templates.content: You can find your Cart ID on the top left corner of your cart before proceeding to checkout. Let me know if you still can't find it.

templates.name: Sizing shirts and hoodies
templates.content: To ensure a great fit when ordering, be sure to consult the size charts here: https://support.halloweencostumes.com/kb/a117/sizing-for-shirts-hoodies.aspx Please note that the measurements listed are an average taken from several different tees, so the t-shirt you order may vary slightly.

templates.name: Customized costumes
templates.content: We don't currently have the option to customize any of our costumes, but keep an eye out on the website for updates on this!

templates.name: Do FunBucks expire?
templates.content: Fun Bucks NEVER expire! ðŸ™‚

templates.name: Do you have a student discount?
templates.content: Glad you asked! You can learn more and apply for your discount here: https://www.halloweencostumes.com/coupons-and-discounts?category=student-discount

templates.name: Price Matching
templates.content: Feel free to check this page out for information regarding our price matching guidelines: https://support.halloweencostumes.com/kb/a52/price-match-guarantee.aspx?KBSearchID=384293 Also note that anything "Made by Us" is not eligible as no other vendor has access to these products at this time.

templates.name: Can you retroactively apply my Fun Bucks to my order?
templates.content: Yes, we can apply your Fun Bucks to your order! Can I please have your order number, email address, and your code as well?

templates.name: Where are your items shipped from?
templates.content: We ship worldwide, all from our headquarters and warehouse in the US, specifically located in MN.

templates.name: Shipping time
templates.content: We usually ship via USPS, UPS, or FedEx, and once shipped, it will take 1-8 business days domestically, and 1 week to 1 month internationally, depending on the shipping method you choose at checkout.

templates.name: Wholesale inquiries
templates.content: We don't currently have any wholesale or B2B options since we're focused on direct consumer retail, but you're welcome to make use of our available consumer discounts such as our 15% welcome discount for your first order!

templates.name: Return policy
templates.content: You can check out our detailed return policy here - https://www.halloweencostumes.com/returns/

templates.name: Free Shipping
templates.content: At the moment we do not offer free shipping. Shipping prices vary based on weight/dimensions of the items in your cart, so the best way to determine pricing would be to add the items you're interested in to a cart and head to the checkout screen!

templates.name: Phone support
templates.content: You can give us a call at (507) 386-8388 or let me know if I can help via text, it may be faster.

templates.name: Military / first responder discount
templates.content: Thank you for your service! You can learn more and apply for your discount here: https://www.halloweencostumes.com/coupons-and-discounts

templates.name: Cancel / edit order
templates.content: I can check if that's possible. What's the order number, email address, and the change you'd like to make?

templates.name: Sizing
templates.content: Our product measurements are taken in-house when we receive the product from the manufacturer to ensure accuracy. Please note that the measurements are of the costume itself, and not the person that will be inside of it. You can also check out our size guide here: https://support.halloweencostumes.com/kb/a63/sizing-for-costumes.aspx?KBSearchID=383895

templates.name: Customer support
templates.content: The best way to handle this is to email us directly at support@halloweencostumes.com. Our team is happy to help!

templates.name: Social media
templates.content: Give us a follow on IG: https://www.instagram.com/FunCostumes and FB here: https://www.facebook.com/HalloweenCostumesDotCom

templates.name: Order status/tracking update
templates.content: You can use our convenient online tool to see the latest updates on your order: https://www.halloweencostumes.com/order-status.aspx

templates.name: How do I start a return?
templates.content: You can start your return here: https://halloweencostumes.attn.tv/sl/bE0EZGLh

templates.name: Retroactive discount
templates.content: If the discount is a military discount, student discount, or any active discount we're currently offering, we might be able to issue a retroactive refund. Can I have your email address and order number, please?

templates.name: Damaged/Defective Item
templates.content: My apologies for the inconvenience. Can I please have your order number and photos of the defective item as well?

templates.name: Store location / retailer
templates.content: We don't currently have a store but definitely keep an eye out.

templates.name: Sales Collection
templates.content: You can take a look at our sale collection here: https://www.halloweencostumes.com/costumes-on-sale.html?utm_content=top_nav_links

templates.name: Refund after Order Cancelation
templates.content: After your order has been cancelled, the refund should appear on your original payment method within 3-5 business days.
